revision.comment: Created page with "{{Exam |Title=Financial Mathematics |Examiner=Institute and Faculty of Actuaries |Date=15-April-2013 }}"

revision.text:
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=9|Marks=9|Oracle=6.84% escalation per year|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
Verification of examiner solution of 6.84% escalation per year.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>4000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>4000000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>900000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.5</effective_time><cashflow_value>850420.06427076</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-6800000</rate_per_year><effective_time>6</effective_time><cashflow_value>-3445091.6240058</cashflow_value></item2><item3><m>4</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>5</term><value>5.75073901</value><escalation_delta>0.067658648473815</escalation_delta><escalation_rate_effective>0.0683544</escalation_rate_effective><escalation_frequency>1</escalation_frequency><rate_per_year>-360000</rate_per_year><effective_time>1</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2070266.0436</cashflow_value></item3></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
===Derivation of escalation rate (as in examiner report)===
Present value of net outgo excluding rental income is 1,405,328.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>4000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>4000000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>900000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.5</effective_time><cashflow_value>900000</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-6800000</rate_per_year><effective_time>6</effective_time><cashflow_value>-6800000</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
So present value of rental income is \begin{align} 1,405,328 & = 360,000 v \ddot{a}^{(4)}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{1}}} \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j \\ & = 360000 / 1.12 * 0.95887302 \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j \\ \Rightarrow \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j & = 1,405,328 \times 1.12 / (360000 * 0.95887302) \\ & = 4.559656. \end{align}
(By interpolation), required net rate j is 4.834128% per year
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_escalating</request><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><i_effective/><term>5</term><value>4.559656</value><escalation_rate_effective/><escalation_frequency/></parameters></fin-math>
So escalation rate is 1.12 / 1.04834128 -1 = 6.83544% per year.

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=11|Part=ii|Marks=4|Oracle=26.62|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Exam question}}
Interest rate of 15% convertible monthly is interest rate of 15%/12 = 1.25% per month.
Increasing annuity paying 1, 2 .. 60 has present value 1126.9 and 26.62 * 1126.9 = 29,998.
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.0125</i_effective><term>60</term><value/><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=11|Part=iii|Marks=5|Oracle=12.8%|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
APR is 12.76% rounded up to 1dp = 12.8%. Amount repaid per year = 958.32 * 12 = 11,499.84.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>30000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>30000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>12</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>5</term><value>5</value><rate_per_year>-11499.84</rate_per_year><effective_time>3</effective_time><cashflow_value>4791.6</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><value>0</value></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=5|Marks=7|Oracle=2128.77|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>1</m><source_m>2</source_m><source_rate>0.06</source_rate><i_effective/></parameters></fin-math>
Present value = 1047.22. Accumulated value = present value * 1.0609^12 = 1047.22 * 1.0609^12 = 2128.78.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>4</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>4</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>12</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>8</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.0609</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2015|Number=4|Part=i|Marks=4}}
Forward value is present value accumulated = $$9.0161 * 1.05^{(9/12)} = 9.352.$$
Present value is 9.0161.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>10</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.08333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.58333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.05</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2014|Number=9|Part=ii|Marks=6|Oracle=£105.0425, 3.6982%|Oracle-source=CT1 A2014 Examiner's report}} ====Bond price==== 4*(1/(1.036)+1/(1.037^2))+109/(1.038^3) = 105.042
====Par yield==== <fin-math><parameters><CT1_Spot_Rates><item0><delta>0.035367143837291</delta><effective_time>1</effective_time></item0><item1><delta>0.03633192924739</delta><effective_time>2</effective_time></item1><item2><delta>0.037295784743697</delta><effective_time>3</effective_time></item2></CT1_Spot_Rates><request>explain_par</request><par_term>2</par_term></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2014|Number=10|Part=i|Marks=3|Oracle=£1,462.31|Oracle-source=CT1 A2014 Examiner's report}}
a25=10.67477619.
(Ia)25=98.47888326.
Repay=50 + X.
X * a25 + 50 * (Ia)25 = 20,000.
So Repay = 50 + X = 50 + (20000 - 50 * 98.47888326)/ 10.67477619 = 1,462.31
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_escalating</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>25</term><value/><escalation_rate_effective/><escalation_frequency/></parameters></fin-math>
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>25</term><value/><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2014|Number=10|Part=ii|Marks=2|Oracle=£20,293.01|Oracle-source=CT1 A2014 Examiner's report}}
Capital outstanding = (X + 3 * 50) * a22 + 50 * (Ia)22 = (1462.31-50+150)* 10.20074366 + 50 * 87.12640000 = 20,293.04 (not covering interest payments yet)
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_escalating</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>22</term><value/><escalation_rate_effective/><escalation_frequency/></parameters></fin-math>
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>22</term><value/><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2014|Number=10|Part=iv|Marks=3|Oracle=£31,557.66|Oracle-source=CT1 A2014 Examiner's report}}
(1462.31 - 50) * 25 + 50 * 26*25/2 - 20000 = 31,558.

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=1|Part=i|Marks=4|Oracle=4.3062%, 4.3936%, 4.4260%, 24.618%|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}}
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_m/><source_rate/><i_effective>0.045</i_effective></parameters></fin-math>
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>12</m><advance>1</advance><source_m/><source_rate/><i_effective>0.045</i_effective></parameters></fin-math>
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>4</m><advance>0</advance><source_m/><source_rate/><i_effective>0.045</i_effective></parameters></fin-math>
Effective rate over 5 years = 0.24618 = 1.045^5 - 1 = 5 * i(0.2)
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>0.2</m><advance>0</advance><source_m/><source_rate/><i_effective>0.045</i_effective></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=3|Part=i|Marks=2|Oracle=£108.584|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}}
Working in half-years

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=6|Marks=10|Oracle=£275,324|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}}
Receipts in year 1 = 1% * 40000 cars/day * £1/car * 365 days/year = £146,000/year.
Receipts in year 2 = 1% * 50000 cars/day * £1.1/car * 365 days/year = £200,750/year.
Annual escalation of receipts = 1.01 (tolls) * 1.01 (cars) -1 = 0.0201.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1000</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.076961041136128</delta><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>1</term><value>0.96248794169835</value><rate_per_year>146000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>140523.23948796</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1000</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.076961041136128</delta><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>19</term><value>10.692854773277</value><escalation_delta>0.0099503308531681</escalation_delta><escalation_rate_effective>0.0201</escalation_rate_effective><escalation_frequency>1</escalation_frequency><rate_per_year>200750</rate_per_year><effective_time>1</effective_time><cashflow_value>1987583.8849401</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.076961041136128</delta><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-2000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2000000</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>15</term><value>15</value><rate_per_year>420</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>6300</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>15</term><value>120</value><increasing>1</increasing><rate_per_year>-20</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2400</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=9|Part=ii|Marks=2|Oracle=£122.106, £277.894|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}}
Interest = 3052.65 * 0.04 = £122.106.
Capital = 400 - interest = 400 - 122.106 = £277.894 (leaving 3052.65 - 277.894 = 2774.756).
compare with outstanding value <fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>14</term><value>15</value><rate_per_year>400</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>6300</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>14</term><value>120</value><increasing>1</increasing><rate_per_year>-20</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2400</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>

Outstanding capital = £1,099.18.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>7</term><value>15</value><rate_per_year>260</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>6300</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>7</term><value>120</value><increasing>1</increasing><rate_per_year>-20</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2400</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>
50% * 1099.18 = 549.59. First instalment is 72.16 + 2 (step) = £74.16.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>10</term><value>55</value><increasing>1</increasing><rate_per_year>2</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>110</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>10</term><value>10</value><rate_per_year>72.16</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>721.6</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.08</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>

0.5 * 197927738.83 / 1081108.96 = £91.539m nominal.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0.048790164169432</delta><i_effective>0.05</i_effective><term>10</term><value>7.7217349291848</value><rate_per_year>50000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>386086.74645924</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0.048790164169432</delta><i_effective>0.05</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>10</effective_time><cashflow_value>613913.25354076</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>
0.5 * 197927738.83 / 1267109.34 = £78.102m nominal.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance></advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0.095310179804325</delta><i_effective>0.1</i_effective><term>5</term><value>3.7907867694084</value><rate_per_year>100000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>379078.67694084</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate></source_rate><source_format></source_format><delta>0.095310179804325</delta><i_effective>0.1</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>5</effective_time><cashflow_value>620921.32305915</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value></value></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=11|Part=iii|Marks=3|Oracle=15.48 years|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}}
306.32307631 /19.79277388 = 15.477 years.
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>40</term><value></value><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2013|Number=11|Part=iv|Marks=4|Oracle=6.23 years|Oracle-source=CT1 S2013 Examiner's report}} (91.539 * (50000 * 41.99224806 + 1000000 * 10 * 1.04^-10) + 78.102* (100000 *13.00649226 + 1000000 * 5 * 1.04^-5) )/197927738.83= 6.23 years
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>10</term><value></value><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
